mapper.select: /* DayProdMapper.getSaleAmtFgRemarkList */ SELECT thpsmm.SIDE_PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM AS SIDE_PROD_NM , thp.REMARK AS SIDE_REMARK , thpsmm.PROD_CD , thp2.PROD_NM , thp2.REMARK FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD thpsmm , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp2 WHERE thpsmm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsmm.SIDE_PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsmm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp2.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsmm.PROD_CD = thp2.PROD_CD AND thpsmm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ORDER BY thpsmm.SIDE_PROD_CD , thpsmm.PROD_CD

/* DayProdMapper.getSaleAmtFgRemarkList3 */ SELECT thp.HQ_BRAND_CD , (SELECT HQ_BRAND_NM FROM TB_HQ_BRAND thb WHERE thb.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thb.HQ_BRAND_CD = thp.HQ_BRAND_CD) AS HQ_BRAND_NM , thpcv.L_CLASS_CD , thpcv.L_CLASS_NM , thpcv.M_CLASS_CD , thpcv.M_CLASS_NM , thpcv.S_CLASS_CD , thpcv.S_CLASS_NM , thp.PROD_CD , thp.REMARK , thp.PROD_NM , 0 AS SDATTR_DISP_SEQ , thp.SDSEL_GRP_CD , thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_NM , DECODE(thpsg.FIX_PROD_FG, '0', '선택', '1', '고정') AS GRP_FIX_PROD_FG , DECODE(thpsg.SDSEL_TYPE_FG, 'C', '세트', 'S', '싱글세트') AS SDSEL_TYPE_FG , thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_CD , thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_NM , thpsc.DISP_SEQ AS SDSEL_CLASS_DISP_SEQ , thpsc.SDSEL_QTY , DECODE(thpsc.REQUIRE_YN, 'Y', '필수선택', 'N', '선택안함') AS REQUIRE_YN , thpsp.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD , thp2.REMARK AS SDSEL_REMARK , thp2.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM , thpsp.DISP_SEQ AS SDSEL_PROD_DISP_SEQ , thpsp.ADD_PROD_UPRC , thpsp.ADD_PROD_QTY , DECODE(thpsp.FIX_PROD_FG, '0', '선택', '1', '고정') AS FIX_PROD_FG FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP thpsg , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS thpsc , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD thpsp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp2 , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS_V02 thpcv WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpsg.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thpsc.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thpsp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpsg.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.SDSEL_GRP_CD = thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND thpsg.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) AND thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_CD = thpsc.SDSEL_GRP_CD (+) AND thpsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) AND thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = thpsp.SDSEL_CLASS_CD (+) AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp2.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp2.PROD_CD (+) AND thpcv.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpcv.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD
AND thp.PROD_CD || thpsp.PROD_CD IN (SELECT SIDE_PROD_CD || PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd})
AND thp.PROD_CD || thpsp.PROD_CD IN ( SELECT SIDE_PROD_CD || PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD_V01 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} -- 보정규칙 MINUS SELECT SIDE_PROD_CD || PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} -- 보정확정상품 MINUS SELECT SIDE_PROD_CD || PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD_EX WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} -- 보정예외상품 )
AND thp.PROD_CD || thpsp.PROD_CD IN (SELECT SIDE_PROD_CD || PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_MOMS_MOD_EX WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd})
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thpsp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp2.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 상품브랜드 선택일때
-- 상품브랜드 전체일때 AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD, thpsc.DISP_SEQ, thpsp.DISP_SEQ

/* DayProdMapper.getUserBrandCdList */ SELECT LISTAGG(twub.HQ_BRAND_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY twub.HQ_BRAND_CD) AS HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND twub WHERE 1=1 AND twub.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY twub.USER_ID
